member.name: AppPolicyLifecycleManagement
member.summary: The AppPolicyLifecycleManagement enumeration indicates whether a process is lifecycle-managed or not.

member.name: AppPolicyLifecycleManagement.AppPolicyLifecycleManagement_Unmanaged
member.summary: Indicates that the process's lifecycle is not managed.

member.name: AppPolicyLifecycleManagement.AppPolicyLifecycleManagement_Managed
member.summary: Indicates that the process's lifecycle is managed by Process Lifecycle Manager (PLM).
